Articles.Content:
So, I made a new install, added just a few mods, and the game started crashing when loading; and I have no idea why.

The files are here: https://www.dropbox.com/s/87y6lgwcqduqsz0/error.log?dl=0

https://www.dropbox.com/s/6bfsltaatlxp3d4/KSP.rar?dl=0

and https://www.dropbox.com/s/2n9ccpg6tqdzilh/output_log.rar?dl=0

thanks

Your install is a horrible mess. The output log lists several mods multiple times and for multiple versions of the game that will definiteley not be compatible with the version of the game your playing. If you want to play 1.3.1 then delete everything and only install the versions of the mods you want that were made for 1.3.1.
That's weird because  I installed the mods with ckan and not manually.

I can see in your history that you already had the very same problem with the same diagnosis a few months ago. How did you fix that or is this just the second try?

I can also see from the logs that you are using a copy of the original game folder from Steam. Did you actually made sure to remove all mods from the original GameData folder before or at least after copying the whole KSP folder?

I found out that its a mod that causes the problem last time it was a mod that added Chinese rocket part for my RSS save, and now I took all the mods that I installed yesterday and it works, now I need to manually check one mod at a time.

@JPGSP Since you are running KSP 1.3.1 stick to mods for that version. I took a look at the logs you posted and your mods were all over the place 1.2.2, 1.3.1, 1.4, 1.5, 1.6 and 1.7. The Unity version the game is built upon changed at 1.4 so you run a high risk of incompatibility running newer mods on your install. It's obvious in the log that several of your mods fail to load their .dlls because of this.
